        public void scheduleTask(String tag,
                         Class<?> cls,
                         long lowerWindow,
                         long upperWindow)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkTaskScheduler
        Schedules a task to be run within the specified window.
        Specified by:
        scheduleTask in interface NetworkTaskScheduler
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag used to identify the task.
        cls - The service class to launch when the task is triggered.
        lowerWindow - The lower execution window for the task.
        upperWindow - The upper execution window for the task.
